jakarta.nosql.column

Interface ColumnPreparedStatementAsync


  • public interface ColumnPreparedStatementAsync
    An object that represents a precompiled Query statement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColumnPreparedStatementAsync bind(String name, Object value)
      Binds an argument to a positional parameter.
      void getResult(Consumer<Stream<ColumnEntity>> callBack)
      Executes a query and return the result as Stream
      void getSingleResult(Consumer<Optional<ColumnEntity>> callBack)
      Returns the result as a single element otherwise it will return an Optional.empty()

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        ColumnPreparedStatementAsync bind(String name,
                                  Object value)
        Binds an argument to a positional parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - the parameter name
        value - the parameter value
        Returns:
        the same query instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when there is null parameter

      • getResult

        void getResult(Consumer<Stream<ColumnEntity>> callBack)
        Executes a query and return the result as Stream
        Parameters:
        callBack - the callback

      • getSingleResult

        void getSingleResult(Consumer<Optional<ColumnEntity>> callBack)
        Returns the result as a single element otherwise it will return an Optional.empty()
        Parameters:
        callBack - the result callback
        Throws:
        NonUniqueResultException - when the result has more than one entity
